Package gg.sep.alyx.config

Class ConfigHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.sep.alyx.config.ConfigHandler
  • public class ConfigHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    ConfigHandler is responsible for creating, updating, and reading an Alyx config files. The config file used is specified by the user as a CLI argument when launching Alyx, or a default "app dirs" file is created and used based on the user's operating system.

      • loadAlyxConfig

        public java.util.Optional<AlyxConfig> loadAlyxConfig()
        Attempts to load and parse the config file into an AlyxConfig.
        Returns:
        Returns an Optional of the AlyxConfig if successful, otherwise an empty Optional.

      • loadBotConfig

        public java.util.Optional<BotConfig> loadBotConfig​(BotEntry botEntry)
        Attempts to load and parse the config file into an BotConfig.
        Parameters:
        botEntry - The BotEntry for which to load the bot's config.
        Returns:
        Returns an Optional of the BotConfig if successful, otherwise an empty Optional.

      • updateBotEntry

        public void updateBotEntry​(BotEntry botEntry)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Updates or creates a bot entry in the config file, overwriting any existing bot entry with the same name.
        Parameters:
        botEntry - Bot Entry to update in the config. If it doesn't exist, it will be created.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if writing to the config file failed.

      • updateBotConfig

        public void updateBotConfig​(BotEntry botEntry,
                            BotConfig botConfig)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Updates a bot's config file, overwriting any existing bot config.
        Parameters:
        botEntry - Bot Entry for which to update the config.
        botConfig - The Bot Config to write.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if writing to the config file failed.

      • writeConfig

        public void writeConfig​(AlyxConfig alyxConfig)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Write the AlyxConfig to the config file, overwriting any existing configuration.
        Parameters:
        alyxConfig - Alyx Config to write to disk.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if writing to the config file failed.

      • writeBotConfig

        public void writeBotConfig​(BotEntry botEntry,
                           BotConfig botConfig)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Write the BotConfig to the config file, overwriting any existing configuration.
        Parameters:
        botEntry - The BotEntry for the bot's config.
        botConfig - BotConfig to write to disk.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if writing to the config file failed.
